vampire.config_products.VHIPopnImpactProductImpl module¶

class vampire.config_products.VHIPopnImpactProductImpl.VHIPopnImpactProductImpl(country, valid_from_date, valid_to_date, vampire_defaults)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.ImpactProductImpl.ImpactProductImpl

Initialise VHIPopnImpactProductImpl.

Implementation class for VHIPopnImpactProduct. Initialise object parameters.

country : string
Region of dataset - country name or ‘global’.
product_date : datetime
Data acquisition date. For pentad/dekad data, the data is actually for the period immediately preceding the product_date. For monthly data, the data covers the month given in the product date. For seasonal data, the product_date refers to the start of the season (3 month period).
interval : string
Data interval to retrieve/manage. Can be daily, pentad, dekad, monthly or seasonal
vampire_defaults : object
VAMPIREDefaults object containing VAMPIRE system default values.
generate_config(hazard_file, hazard_dir, hazard_pattern, boundary_file=None, boundary_dir=None, boundary_pattern=None, boundary_field=None, population_file=None, output_file=None, output_dir=None, output_pattern=None, masked=False)[source]¶
